description.value:
Give off a purple glow if a psychic power is being used, or targeting someone, within 5 metres. Gives of false indications and can cause mental distress when held by anyone capable of channeling the warp.

Requirements

Found often on certain worlds that are devoid of life, they look quartzlike

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
